mapper.sql: id, seller_id, seller_name, domain_id, principal_name, sale_scope, tel_num, pictures_url, certificate, feature, type, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
from examine_done where seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into examine_done (id, seller_id, seller_name, domain_id, principal_name, sale_scope, tel_num, pictures_url, certificate, feature, type, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{principalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{picturesUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
